Translations.Text: he eemaan vaalo! kya main bata doon tumhen aisa vyaapaar, jo bacha le tumhen duhkhadaayee yaatana se
tum eemaan lao allaah tatha usake rasool par aur jihaad karo allaah kee raah mein apane dhanon aur praanon se, yahee tumhaare lie uttam hai, yadi tum jaano
vah kshama kar dega tumhaare paap aur pravesh dega tumhen aise svargon mein, bahatee hain jinamen naharen tatha svachchh gharon mein sthaayee svargon mein. yahee badee saphalata hai
aur ek any (pradaan) jisase tum prem karate ho. vah allaah kee sahaayata tatha sheeghr vijay hai tatha shubh soochana suna do eemaan vaalon ko

he eemaan vaalo! tum ban jao allaah (ke dharm) ke sahaayak, jaise maryam ke putr eesa ne havaariyon se kaha tha ki kaun mera sahaayak hai allaah (ke dharm ke prachaar mein)? to havaariyon ne kahaah ham hain allaah ke (dharm ke) sahaayak. to eemaan laaya israeeliyon ka ek samooh aur kufr kiya doosare samooh ne. to hamane samarthan diya unako, jo eemaan laaye, unake shatru ke virudhd, to vahee vijayee rahe
